accommodations.AccommodationDetails: Budget hostel near Khan Al Khalili, rooftop
Lively hostel in the heart of Cairo’s old quarter with shared spaces and a warm local ambiance.
Budget guesthouse near Egyptian Museum, basic amenities
Traditional guesthouse on the banks of the Nile, decorated with authentic Egyptian motifs.

activities.Description: A beautifully landscaped park with panoramic views of Cairo, great for picnics and evening strolls.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Enjoy the sunset from the top of the park.

activities.Description: Dine at a rooftop restaurant and enjoy panoramic views of Cairo while savoring delicious food.
activities.BudgetDetails: Meal prices vary depending on the type and quality of food.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Book a table in advance to ensure availability.

activities.Description: A park located at the confluence of the Blue and White Nile, ideal for picnics.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Pack a picnic lunch and enjoy the views.

activities.Description: A walk along the Nile Corniche to enjoy views of the illuminated Cairo Tower and cityscape.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Take a romantic sunset stroll with family.

activities.Description: A relaxing cruise with views of Cairo's skyline and historic sites.
activities.BudgetDetails: Ticket prices vary depending on the season and duration of the cruise.
activities.TipsAndRecommendations: Enjoy the sunset from the river while learning about Cairo's history.

seasonals.Question: Best Time to Visit:
seasonals.Answer: The best time to visit Cairo is during the spring (March to May) and autumn (September to November), when the weather is mild and pleasant.

seasonals.Question: Must-Visit Places:
seasonals.Answer: Pyramids of Giza, The Egyptian Museum, Islamic Cairo
